es.definition: Que se mueve o realiza acciones a una alta velocidad; que ocurre o se completa en poco tiempo.

pt.definition: Que se move ou realiza ações em alta velocidade; que ocorre ou se completa em pouco tempo.

type_word.name: Adjective
type_word.description: Words that describe or modify nouns.

definition: Moving or performing actions at a high speed; happening or completing in a short amount of time.
examples: The fast-paced action movie kept the audience on the edge of their seats.
Working in a fast-paced environment requires quick decision-making.
The fast-paced world of technology is constantly evolving.
She enjoyed the challenges of her fast-paced career.
The city's lifestyle is known for being fast-paced and energetic.
